## HTTPErrorX.transform property

Transform that automatically sets httpStatus from the preset key. Only sets httpStatus from presetKey if it matches a known preset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static transform: ErrorXTransform<HTTPErrorXMetadata>;
```
